item.title: How change blk d hide chaps to 1 def
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

you want black d hide chaps to require 1 def? if you do:

go into client.java and search for

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

go under that until you see

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10;

change that to

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 1;

Read full topic
item.source: How change blk d hide chaps to 1 def
